import axios from 'axios'; import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Button, Col, Form, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; function AnswerFaqHelper(props) { const post=props.post; const submithandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:8080/admin/faq/'+post._id,{answer}) } return (
Question Answer setAnswer(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Enter Your Answer" />
) } export default AnswerFaqHelper
